questions.question_text: Which phrase best describes Cisco's software strategy?

discussion.content:
My answer is D, Refer: 
Cisco's software strategy is to use software and software-defined solutions to help customers realize more value from their IT investments across their organizations. To achieve this, Cisco is working across its broad portfolio of products including open APIs to support third-party innovation to address customers' business outcomes.
D - https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/products/collateral/software/one-software/idc-software-strategy-paper.pdf

choices.C: promote collaboration among in teams and organizational levels
choices.D: use software and software-defined solutions to help customers realize more value from their IT investments across their organizations
choices.A: implement a build-and-fix software development model

choices.B: offerings, pricing schedules, service agreements, and routes to market
choices.A: pricing schedules, service agreements, routes to market, and opportunity paradigms
choices.D: offerings, markets, pricing methods, location, and routes to market
choices.C: offerings, routes to market, pricing schedules, and service agreements

questions.question_text: Which of the following are included on the Offering Pattern Reference Model?

discussion.content: According to Introduction to Cisco Sales course, the correct answer is option D, The offer structure template is an example of a business-view architecture model that helps articulate new offers such as solution bundles in terms of offerings, markets, pricing methods, location, and routes to market

Selected Answer: B

Customer Commitment 
This phase involves the presentation of the business case for commitment and execution purposes. Cisco may have an intricate role here, supporting the customer in preparing and presenting the business case. The best outcome would be that the customer presents their case, with the help of Cisco, to their relevant business stakeholders

questions.question_text: Which phrase of Cisco's Sales Cycle involves the presentation of the business case to relevant stakeholders?

discussion.content: I totally Agree correct answer is D
The correct answer is D - Ciso One software is not tied to the hardware.

Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer
The answer is D, refer to link: https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/m/en_ca/offers/assets/pdfs/cisco_one_software_solution-overview.pdf
https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/products/collateral/software/one-software/one-overview-deck.pdf, 5th page: listed A) B) and C), not listed D) (the correct answ is D)

Selected Answer: D
correct answer is D
In the current model, software licensing is tied to the hardware. When it is time for a hardware refresh, software must be purchased again. 

Cisco ONE software is not tied to a box and is portable across generations of hardware boxes. It also provides physical and virtual deployment options. Cisco ONE enables IT to keep innovating by giving them access to software upgrades and new capabilities as they are added to the software suites.

The answer is D 
From the text here is what it does offer: Cisco ONE offers three value propositions: It is a simple set of solutions in
networks and cloud; provides customers with access to innovation, upgrades, and
new capabilities; and finally, it provides customers with license portability and
flexibility.
correct answer is D

choices.C: Simple set of solutions in networks and cloud
choices.A: Access to innovation, upgrades and new capabilities
